pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partition Bipartite Network into Non-Overlapping Biclusters by Optimizing Bipartite Modularity // Function bipmod() that partitions a bipartite network into non-overlapping biclusters by maximizing bipartite modularity defined in Barber (2007) doi:10.1103/PhysRevE.76.066102 using the bipartite version of the algorithm described in Trevio (2015) doi:10.1088/1742-5468/2015/02/P02003.
